Class Triangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Triangle

  • public class Triangle
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple Java application to perform some basic actions on a Triangle. * @author Richard Archbold richarda@fb.com D04107657

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double area()
      Method to calculate the area of the triangle.

      Determine the type of triangle.
      boolean isTriangle()
      Method to calculate of the 3 sides provided do actually form a triangle.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • isTriangle

        public boolean isTriangle()
        Method to calculate of the 3 sides provided do actually form a triangle. This is validated by leveraging that fact that the sum of any two sides must be greater than the third side
        Returns:
        boolean true or false.

      • perimeter

        public double perimeter()
        Method that determines the perimeter of the triangle. This is represented by the sum of the 3 sides.
        Returns:
        perimeter

      • area

        public double area()
        Method to calculate the area of the triangle. Uses Herons formula to calculate the area. Area = sqrt( s(s-a)(s-b)(s- c) ) where s = (a + b + c) / 2.
        Returns:
        area
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • determineType

        public java.lang.String determineType()
        Determine the type of triangle. The triangle is: Equilateral, if all 3 sides are equal, Isosceles if two sides are equal and Scalene if no sides are equal.
        Returns:
        trigType the type of triangle

      • redisplayUserInput

        public static void redisplayUserInput(double[] entries)
        Simple method to redisplay back the the user the trianlge they entered.
        Parameters:
        entries, - the array containing the triangle sides

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method, prompts the use to enter the sides of the triangle to be acted upon, then calls all necessary methods and displays the output to the user.
        Parameters:
        args - command line args
